sections.general: interim membership director professional profile highly responsible and dedicated professional with a proven record of success in member engagement and experience. excellent manager of both large groups and small teams. works well in groups. volunteers own time.â able to multitask effectively and handle evolving job priorities. superior organizational, leadership and interpersonal skills. successful in hiring and retaining highly motivated and member oriented employees. qualifications oranized human resources experience trustworthy relationship builder team player skilled motivator volunteer highly dependable works well under pressure microsoft word, excel, outlook proficient energetic personality relevant experience process improvement updated and created new departmental procedures. assessed organizational training needs.
